seekerMeditationSessionScreen.meditationGuideLinePoint1: When you hear the words "Please start meditation" have the thought that the source of Divine light is already present in your heart and is attracting you from within.
seekerMeditationSessionScreen.meditationGuideLinePoint2: Be open and receptive to the transmission.
seekerMeditationSessionScreen.meditationGuideLinePoint3: Don't fight your thoughts, Let them be.
seekerMeditationSessionScreen.meditationGuideLinePoint4: Gently remind yourself that you are meditating on the source of divine light in your heart
seekerMeditationSessionScreen.meditationGuideLinePoint5: Meditation session ends when you hear the word "That's all" from the app.
seekerMeditationSessionScreen.meditationGuideLinePoint6: If for some unforeseen circumstances you need to exit the meditation session in-between, you can click on "Cancel"
